description: 17 Commission de Délimitation de la Frontière Germano-Danoise, Hotel Alssund, 258 S⊘nderborg, Denmark. November 26th, 1920 Colonel E.Agar presents his compliments to the Cheif Clerk of the Foreign Office and with reference to para (1) of Foreign Office Letter (C 8097/733/18) of the 9th instant:- It is not understood in what respect there is an error of 5 Kroner in Voucher No.6 accompanying the September Quarter Accounts - It is thought that through a typographical error the sum of 5 Kroner has omitted from the amount charged for "Poster at Esbjerg, baggage for self and boxes of instruments, regis- tering etc" as this amount appears on that Voucher - a fresh copy of which is attached- Under these circumstances the original amount viz. £18.19.9 is still charged in the accounts and the amount carried for- ward from the September Quarter Accounts until I receive any further instructions to the contrary has been retained at £.98.14.7 made up of Balance from September Quarter £.94..4. 7 24th to 30th June recredit of 10/- per diem Subsis- tence Allowance 3.10 .0 1st and 2nd July recredit of 10/- per diem Subsis- tense Allowance 1. 0. 0 £.98. 14 7 I would point out that the Commission Allowances commenced from 3rd July, the date fixed by the Council of Ambassadors as the first constitution of the Commission. British Commissioner, Slesvig Boundary Commission Colonel Agar's address after the receipt of this letter will be: Colonel E.Agar, C.M.G., C/o Messrs Cox & Co, "H" Branch, 16 Charing Cross, S.W.

British Commissioner, Slesvig Boundary Commission Colonel Agar's address after the receipt of this letter will be: Colonel E.Agar, C.M.G., C/o Messrs Cox & Co, "H" Branch, 16 Charing Cross, S.W.
